    Class Description
    AdminController
    Controller class for the admin UI page
    Administrator
    User implementation for administrators
    AdministratorRepository
    Repository for accessing Administrator Users persistence
    ApiError
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    ApiExceptionHandler
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    ConfigParseException  
    DirectoriesConfig  
    DocCollection
    db entity representing indexed document collections
    DocCollectionExistsException  
    DocCollectionRepository  
    Downloader  
    EntityExistsException  
    Experiment
    db entity representing experiments
    Experiment.Status  
    ExperimentConfigStorage
    utility class for storing and retrieving files in the experimentConfig directory defined in application.properties
    ExperimentConfigurer
    File based TestGgroup and Participant configuration
    Experimenter
    User implementation for experimenters
    ExperimenterRepository
    Repository for accessing Experimenter Users persistence
    ExperimentExistsException  
    ExperimentRepository
    Repository for accessing Participant Experiments persistence
    ExperimentsController
    Controller class for the experiments UI page
    ExperimentService  
    ExperimentStatusException  
    ExtractedDocument
    Data class representing wrapping the result of a Tika text extraction process
    FileDeleteException
    Exception thrown when a file delete operation fails
    FileReadException
    Exception thrown when a file read operation fails
    FileStorage
    base class for general file storage see https://github.com/spring-guides/gs-uploading-files
    FileWriteException
    Exception thrown when a file write operation fails
    HseApplication
    Main Application class
    HseUserDetailsService
    Provides user details for SpringSecurity authentication
    IndexBuilder  
    Indexer  
    IndexingConfig  
    IndexingController
    Controller class for the indexing UI page
    IndexingResult  
    IndexingService
    Service class for handling the indexing process
    Language
    defines the supported languages, i.e.
    LanguageNotSupportedException  
    NoSuchDocCollectionException  
    NoSuchEntityException  
    NoSuchExperimentException  
    NoSuchFileException
    Exception thrown on requests to read a non-existing file
    NoSuchTestGroupException  
    NoSuchUserException
    Exception thrown on attempts to retrieve a User by a non existing id id user name
    Participant
    User implementation for participants
    ParticipantRepository
    Repository for accessing Participant Users persistence
    Role
    Stores a user's role: one of "ADMIN", "EXPERIMENTER" or "PARTICCIPANT"
    RoleRepository  
    SearchController
    Controller class for the search UI page
    SearchData  
    SearchResult
    Data transfer class for serving search result summaries
    SearchResultList
    Data transfer class containing the query string and the retrieved results
    SearchService
    Service class for interacting with the Lucene Search API
    SecurityConfiguration
    Configuration for user authentication settings
    TestGroup
    db entity representing test groups
    TestGroupExistsException  
    TestGroupRepository
    Repository for accessing TestGroup persistence
    TextExtractor
    Extracts metadata and text from Html or Pdf InputStream see https://www.tutorialspoint.com/tika/index.htm
    TextFileStorage  
    UrlListStorage
    utility class for storing and retrieving files in the url lists directory defined in application.properties
    User
    Base class representing users for security/authentication Planned subclasses: Administrator, Experimenter, Participant
    UserBaseRepository<T extends User>
    Base for User repositories
    UserExistsException
    Exception thrown on attempts to create a User with an already existing user name or id
    UserRepository
    Repository for accessing User persintence via base class
    UserService
    Service class for accessing the User persistence layer
    WebConfig
    Locale configurations to allow multi-language
